articles.title: These maps show how natural gas is behind Russia's power - CNN
articles.description: It is not just with military might that Russia impacts the world, the country has vast oil and gas reserves. With much of Europe relying on Russian gas, Putin's pipeline diplomacy now has its sights on China.
